Dgame.Graphics.Transformable



abstract class Transformable: Dgame.Graphics.Moveable.Moveable;
Basic implementation for transformable objects.

Author:
rschuett

protected const void _applyTranslation();
Apply translation to the object.

void resetTranslation();
Reset the translation.

final void setRotation(short rotAngle);
Set a (new) rotation.

final void rotate(short rotAngle);
Increase/Decrease the rotation.

final const pure nothrow short getRotation();
Returns the current rotation.

final void setScale(float zoom);
Set a new scale.

final void scale(float zoom);
Increase/Decrease the scale/zoom.

final const pure nothrow float getScale();
Returns the current scale/zoom.
